welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Brightlingsea, a charming coastal town known for its picturesque views and friendly community. We invite you to explore our quaint streets, beautiful beaches, and immerse yourself in our unique culture. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Southend Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is a smaller terminal used for budget airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wethersfield Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private jet passengers, providing a more luxurious and exclusive experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
